text: Fire Sale is a 1977 American comedy movie directed by Alan Arkin (who also stars) and based on the novel by Robert Klane. It stars Rob Reiner, Vincent Gardenia, Kay Medford, Alex Rocco, Anjanette Comer, Sid Caesar and Oliver Clark and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1977 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies based on books
title: Fire Sale
